WelcomePage.frontend team: We are a team of three junior frontend developers (React Course) from RSS School, working on our final project, APIQuest. You can find more information about us and the school in the site footer.
WelcomePage.scrum process: We follow the Scrum methodology, using Jira for project management and Confluence for documentation. Our daily standups are at 10:00 UTC+2. Our comprehensive project documentation includes role descriptions, project architecture, meeting minutes (MoM), and other essential information. The main communication channel is the Discord/DreamTeam server.
WelcomePage.team collaboration: We are committed to creating a functional and high-quality product, leveraging the experience we've gained throughout our training. We collaborate actively, share ideas, and solve problems together, which helps us enhance our skills and grow as professionals.

SignIn/SignUp.name: Name
SignIn/SignUp.please enter a valid email address: please enter a valid email address
SignIn/SignUp.email should not contain dots at the beg: email should not contain dots at the beginning @
SignIn/SignUp.password must be at least 8 characters: password must be at least 8 characters
SignIn/SignUp.password should contain at least 1 lette: password should contain at least 1 letter
SignIn/SignUp.password should contain at least 1 digit: password should contain at least 1 digit
SignIn/SignUp.password must contain at least 1 special: password must contain at least 1 special character

errors.auth/too-many-requests: Too many requests. Please try again later
errors.auth/email-already-in-use: Email already in use. Please use a different email address.
errors.internal server error: An internal server error has occurred. Please try again later
errors.an unexpected error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
